calculateValue(Player) - Method in class game.Board

CHALLENGE - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[EXT CHALLENGE] [CLIENT] The keyword indicating a request to challenge players.
challenge(String[]) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[EXT CHALLENGE][CLIENT] A request to challenge players for a game, supplying a list of 1 to 3 usernames to challenge.
challengeDenied() - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[EXT CHALLENGE][SERVER] Message send to all players in a challenge when one of the challenged players has denied the challenge.
CHAT - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[EXT CHAT][SERVER] The keyword indicating a chat message.
chat(String, String) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[EXT CHAT][SERVER] A chat message to send to all players of a game.
checkCommand(String) - Method in class server.Client
Checks a String for commands.
Client - Class in server
